A lot of twists and deaths. I feel like:
I went to film school in large part because of the feeling six year old me got in the theatre when Red Five switched off his targeting computer and trusted in something larger than himself over technology... and his friend in the piece of junk came back to help\, because some things are more important than money.
This new film has no Joseph Campbell heroic journey. No lesson for young people.
The theme which the writer keeps repeating to the audience is to "kill the past".which this film does. It is spoken by the leader of the Dark Side.
Star Wars has been a huge\, hidden part of my life. A secret nerd with a box of action figures in the attic who was first in line with his mom for Empire. But... I'm done. It feels a little sad and a little like relief.
